# ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState

**Enumeration**

Values that represent the different presentations of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island for use in Xcode previews.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency enum DynamicIslandPreviewViewState
```

## Dynamic Island presentations

- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState.compact**: The presentation of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island that shows both the [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/DynamicIslandMode/compactLeading] and [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/DynamicIslandMode/compactTrailing] views combined.
- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState.minimal**: The minimal presentation of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island.
- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState.expanded**: The expanded presentation of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island.

## Live Activity preview types

- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.content**: The Live Activity presentation that appears on the Lock Screen and as a banner on devices that don’t support the Dynamic Island.
- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.dynamicIsland(_:)**: The Live Activity presentation that appears in the Dynamic Island.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
